txt.en: 'Gwyllion! Stop this madness!'

'[placeholder], you told me that the altars bore the same marks as the tokens you brought from Saeradan. If this is indeed the case, the tokens may perhaps be used to call Gwyllion and her allies to the Slade.\n\n'Come with me to the Slade of Shadows. There, we will see how the tokens may be of use to us.'
'Enter the Slade and place the tokens upon the altars, then return here to me. If I am correct, we may soon see the end of the Old Woman of the Mountain.'
'Let us see if my plan will bear fruit....'
'The Old Woman of...the Mountain...lingers still, but not...unharmed. Now is the time to...strike. Now is the time to...move....'

'Unnh...[placeholder]...when Gwyllion...said what she did...about the living...it...it reminded me of the...rest of the legend.

'The Dutegelh's weakness is the...living spirit...the gift of life. It has...ended the darkness.

'Collect the tokens of the gurach...from the altars, then...return to me...while I still have...breath....'
Stop the elhudan from entering the cauldron
'I shall not...be returning with you...[placeholder]. The cost of defeating...death...is the life...of the living.\n\n'Return to...Saeradan and tell him...of our victory. Fare...well....'
Defeated the Tribunal of Shadows
'I shall not...be returning with you...[placeholder]. The cost of defeating...death...is the life...of the living.\n\n'Return to...Saeradan and tell him...of our victory. Fare...well....'
Andreg has been defeated
'What is the meaning of this?'
'Come spirits of the Gravenwood! Come to the Dutegelh and bring life to our army!'
Andreg has a plan to draw forth and ensnare Gwyllion and her allies at the Slade of Shadows.
'Why have we been called?'
'Come spirits of the Gravenwood! Come to the Dutegelh and bring life to our army!'
Talk to Andreg
Collect the Token of the Goat from the first altar
Collect the Token of the Ox from the second altar
Collect the Token of the Stag from the third altar
Talk to Andreg
Andreg must not be defeated
Andreg must not be defeated
Talk to Andreg
Follow Andreg to the Slade of Shadows.
Talk to Andreg
Place the Token of the Goat on the first altar
Place the Token of the Ox on the second altar
Place the Token of the Stag on the third altar
Talk to Andreg
Wait with Andreg to see what happens
Stop the elhudan and defeat the Tribunal of Shadows
'Who summons forth the Tribunal of Shadows?'
'You need not reveal yourselves, Duvodiad...it matters not.'
'You may observe as we bring about the doom of Rohan....'
You should speak with Andreg to learn his plan.
'The White Hand shall close its mighty fist upon the forgoil! Rohan shall fall!'
Follow Andreg to the Slade of Shadows.
'Come spirits of the Gravenwood! Come to the Dutegelh and bring life to our army!'
Speak with Andreg at the Slade of Shadows.
'Curse you, Duvodiad! Destroy them!
The three altars can be found between the trees at the heart of the Slade of Shadows.\n\nAndreg instructed you to place the tokens of the gurach on the altars within the Slade of Shadows.
'Curse you, Duvodiad! Destroy them!'
Andreg is hiding near the Slade of Shadows.\n\nYou should return to Andreg at once.
Wait with Andreg to see what happens.
Defeat the Tribunal of Shadows.
Andreg is lying among the shards of the Dutegelh.\n\nYou should see if there is anything you can do to help Andreg.
The tokens of the gurach are upon the altars at the heart of the Slade of Shadows.\n\nAndreg instructed you to collect the tokens of the gurach and return to him.
'Come, follow me, [placeholder]!'
'There is only one way to stop this madness, and that is to destroy the Dutegelh! Fight on, [placeholder]!'
Andreg is lying mortally wounded among the shards of the Dutegelh at the heart of the Slade of Shadows.\n\nYou should bring the tokens of the gurach to Andreg at once.
Andreg is lying mortally wounded among the shards of the Dutegelh at the heart of the Slade of Shadows.\n\nYou should bring the tokens of the gurach to Andreg at once.
Instance: Tribunal of Shadows
